easyquests.name: Loremaster
easyquests.desc: Final post must include at least 500 words of lore.

easyquests.name: Ooh, Shiny!
easyquests.desc: Use at least one glitter/opal color.

easyquests.name: Nocturnal
easyquests.desc: Build must glow in the dark in some way. Dark-environment alt shot must be provided.

easyquests.name: Shoot Your Shot
easyquests.desc: Build must include several functional projectile(s).

easyquests.name: Sticky Situation
easyquests.desc: Build must visibly incorporate at least 8 official LEGO stickers (whether or not they’re applied to the intended parts is irrelevant).

easyquests.name: Originality is Dead
easyquests.desc: Build must use a color scheme from an official non-Toa, non-Glatorian Bionicle set.

easyquests.name: It’s Not a Phase, Mom
easyquests.desc: Build must include booba or subtle phallic imagery.

easyquests.name: Star-Studded
easyquests.desc: Build must visibly incorporate at least 1 part whose dimensions are 4x8 studs or greater.

easyquests.name: I Rebel
easyquests.desc: Build must provide ham-fisted social commentary with an explanation in the description of 50 words or more.

easyquests.name: The Flex Tape Challenge
easyquests.desc: At least 1 significant part of the build must be held together solely with tape.

easyquests.name: Kaleidoscope
easyquests.desc: Build must include at least 8 colors.

easyquests.name: Read the Rules
easyquests.desc: Build must be no shorter than Whenua Metru and no taller than Iruini. Final or alt shot must include size comparison.

easyquests.name: Squash and Stretch
easyquests.desc: Build must include at least 5 rubber or partially-rubber elements (no easy tires, you know what i mean)

easyquests.name: Compelling Caper
easyquests.desc: Build must include at least 5 cloth elements.

medquests.name: Young Flexer
medquests.desc: Build must include 5 or more 01-03 Kanohi masks.

medquests.name: The Forbidden Fruit
medquests.desc: Build must include 5 or more gummies.

medquests.name: Crossing Over
medquests.desc: Build must be part of a System diorama.

medquests.name: The Rainbow Gamble
medquests.desc: Build must visibly incorporate at least 1 color that is absent from all other contestants’ builds that round (no just putting one piece of every color on your build, jackass).

medquests.name: Powered Up
medquests.desc: Build must incorporate a motor or gear play function.

medquests.name: Battle Scars
medquests.desc: Build must visibly incorporate at least 5 broken, damaged, poorly painted, or otherwise marred pieces.

medquests.name: The Uncanny Valley
medquests.desc: Build must visibly incorporate at least 1 Star Wars CCBS head.

medquests.name: A Small Loan
medquests.desc: Build’s total parts must be worth at least $50 USD on BrickLink.

medquests.name: Dual Degree
medquests.desc: Build must consist of 2 or more fully-realized characters (no mini-scale figures).

medquests.name: Mad Macks
medquests.desc: Build must consist of a rider and a vehicle.

medquests.name: Particular Taste
medquests.desc: Build cannot mix G1 and CCBS parts. Choose one or the other, System and Technic are allowed in either case.

medquests.name: The Grand Army of Gourd
medquests.desc: Build must visibly incorporate at least one clone trooper minifigure (can be separated).

medquests.name: Assimilation
medquests.desc: Build must use every piece from at least 1 Bionicle set, excluding McToran.

medquests.name: Looking Kinda Sus
medquests.desc: Amogus of some kind must be present on build.

medquests.name: I was framed
medquests.desc: Build must have complete inner frame, with all exterior armor removable.

hardquests.name: Money’s Tight
hardquests.desc: Build must use less than 200 parts. Part count must be reviewed by judge via exploded photograph.

hardquests.name: The Supreme Unique
hardquests.desc: Build cannot use any colors used in your last posted build. Black, white, and gray are included, but exceptions are made for pins, axles, and single ball joints.

hardquests.name: Packin
hardquests.desc: Build must use the entire contents of one Dots pack.

hardquests.name: The Purist Nightmare
hardquests.desc: Build must visibly incorporate substantial non-LEGO-compatible elements (i.e. other toys, household items)

hardquests.name: Imba, Imba!
hardquests.desc: No part of your build may be symmetrical along the vertical axis.

hardquests.name: A Little Rusty
hardquests.desc: You’re in Iron Builder now. Pick a seed part from one of the IB runs and use as many of it as you can on your build. Judge determines completion of quest; any color of the seed part is allowed.

hardquests.name: New Frontiers
hardquests.desc: Build must use at least one color you’ve never used on a published build before.

hardquests.name: Chameleon
hardquests.desc: Build cannot use any colors used in your last posted build. Black, white, and gray are included, but exceptions are made for pins, axles, and single ball joints.

hardquests.name: Old-School
hardquests.desc: Build cannot use any parts released after 2003 (excluding parts added as a result of sabotage).

hardquests.name: Gourdbots, Roll Out
hardquests.desc: Build must transform. Judge determines completion of quest based on coolness.

hardquests.name: Tiptoe
hardquests.desc: Build must contact the ground on no more than 4 studs’ total area. No stands allowed.

hardquests.name: SHIP It
hardquests.desc: A portion of your build must be 100 studs or longer.

sab1.name: Paparazzi
sab1.desc: Forced to show your WIP to other competitors.

sab2.name: Mirror, Mirror...
sab2.desc: Entry image must be reflected across vertical axis.

sab3.name: Meet The New Guy
sab3.desc: Forced to use a part (single strange, hard-to-use part).

sab4.name: Full Disclosure
sab4.desc: Back of moc cannot be left unfinished (back shot required, no editing out stands).

sab5.name: Creative Liberties
sab5.desc: Opponent names + writes description of your MOC (within reason).

sab7.name: Ink Blotting
sab7.desc: Final photo must incorporate watermark of the saboteur’s choosing (within reason).

sab8.name: The Editor
sab8.desc: Contestant must post their build in their WIP channel and remove whatever small element/concept the spectators choose (it cannot be re-incorporated).

sab11.name: Colorblind
sab11.desc: Ban a color on a contestants build.

sab12.name: Strong Suggestion
sab12.desc: Forced to introduce certain concept/component into build.

sab18.name: Honey, I Shrunk The Build
sab18.desc: Increase/decrease the size of a contestant’s build.

sab19.name: Judge In Training
sab19.desc: Modify or add a condition to the theme (within reason).

sab20.name: The Hourglass
sab20.desc: Decrease player’s build time by 1 hour (no specific targeting allowed).

sab21.name: Flying Blind
sab21.desc: Build in the dark for 30 minutes (you must keep the portions you build).

sab22.name: The Ol’ Switcheroo
sab22.desc: Switch 2 parts of your build and keep them that way (i.e. switching arms and legs).

sab23.name: Character Creation
sab23.desc: Build cannot be posed dynamically (must be standing still or t-posing).

sab24.name: Identity Theft
sab24.desc: Two contestants must swap their build concepts for the rest of the round (8pts to make 2 random people swap, 16pts to make 2 specific people swap).

sab25.name: Natural Selection
sab25.desc: Forced to not use a part (or type of part).

sab26.name: Blacklisting
sab26.desc: Contestant must take all of a specified non-functional part off their build (excluding parts mandated by other sabotages). They cannot add any more for the remainder of the round.

sab27.name: True Jedi
sab27.desc: Contestant must plug all open Technic pinholes on their build with studs.

sab28.name: Some Disassembly Required
sab28.desc: Build must visibly incorporate a brick separator.

sab29.name: Turn Back Time
sab29.desc: Contestant must disassemble a part of their build and sort all its parts back into their organizing system. They cannot take pictures of its construction and cannot rebuild it for 15 minutes.

sab31.name: Mixing Paints
sab31.desc: Forced to introduce a certain color into build.

sab32.name: Gundam Syndrome
sab32.desc: Final build photo must be pelvic-thrusting
